# Next.js 14 Cookie Tracking System

## Project Overview
Full-stack Next.js 14 application with MongoDB backend for tracking browser cookies data.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 (App Router)
- TypeScript
- MongoDB with Mongoose
- NextAuth.js for authentication
- Tailwind CSS
- shadcn/ui components

## Features
- Cookie submission API endpoint
- Duplicate detection logic
- User authentication (email/password)
- Protected dashboard with filtering and pagination
- Admin panel for viewing all submissions
